= Options property =

*Project:* [MessageDialogComponents Message Dialog Components].

*Unit:* _PJMessageDialog_.

*Class:* _[TPJVCLMsgDlg TPJVCLMsgDlg]_

{{{
type
  TPJMsgDlgOption = (
    mdoInhibitCancel, mdoAutoHelpBtn, mdoShowCustomIcon
  );

type
  TPJMsgDlgOptions = set of TPJMsgDlgOption;

property Options: TPJMsgDlgOptions;
}}}

== Description ==

The _Options_ property stores a set of unrelated options that are used to customise the dialog box. The various options are described below:

|| *Value* || *Description* ||
|| `mdoInhibitCancel` || When included in _Options_ this value causes a dialog to be displayed that can't be cancelled. This is done by (1) ignoring any request to display a cancel button, (2) removing the system menu from the dialog and (3) rejecting ESC key presses. ||
|| `mdoAutoHelpBtn` || This option causes the dialog to display a help button when the _[TPJVCLMsgDlgHelpContext HelpContext]_ property is non-zero and to hide the help button when _[TPJVCLMsgDlgHelpContext HelpContext]_ is 0. This setting overrides any help button that may have been requested using the _[TPJVCLMsgDlgButtons Buttons]_ property. ||
|| `mdoShowCustomIcon` || This option only has an effect when _[TPJVCLMsgDlgKind Kind]_ = `mkUser`. When set the option causes the the dialog box to display the icon specified by the _[TPJVCLMsgDlgIconResource IconResource]_ property. When not set no icon is displayed regardless of the value of _[TPJVCLMsgDlgIconResource IconResource]_. ||

The default value of the property is `[mdoAutoHelpBtn, mdoShowCustomIcon]`.
